pages.text: The Tome of Scrapping is a way of retrieving enchantments from an item.$(p)Combining one with another item in an anvil will destroy the other item, and make a book with some of the enchantments at random.
You will always receive half of the enchantments (rounded up).$(p)The enchantments selected are based on your $(l:zenith:enchanting/table/seed)Enchanting Seed$().

pages.title: Superior Scrapping
pages.text: The $(9)Tome of Superior Scrapping$() is an upgraded version of the Tome of Scrapping.$(p)It extracts all of the enchantments on the item, instead of half of them.
The $(9)Tome of Extraction$() is a perfected version of the Tome of Scrapping.$(p)It extracts all the enchantments from an item, and does not destroy the item in the process.
